that you should only ever do a stir-fry

if you try and put four or six portions
of foods into your wok it's not going to
stir-fry it
color it'll sort of steam and boil and
that will make the meat go tough and it
just won't taste stir-fried when it
comes to stir frying the reason you want

nothing wrong with using a spoon and

quality wok get it really really hot get
most of your vegetables and bits and
